sentences.en: A sharp razor gives a close shave.
At last he began to assemble his safety razor.
sentences.cn: 最后他开始安装安全刮脸刀.

sentences.en: BATHROOMS: A man has five items in his bathroom: a toothbrush, shaving cream, razor, a bar of soap, and a towel from the Holiday Inn.
sentences.cn: 一个男人在他的盥洗室里有五件东西：一把牙刷，剃须膏，剃刀，一盒肥皂和从假日旅馆顺来的一条毛巾。

sentences.en: Even with a razor, he would be no match for William Strickland.
sentences.cn: 即使是拿着刮胡刀, 他也不是WilliamStrickland的对手.

sentences.en: Everyone kept asking you for razor blades.
Have you packed me a razor?
sentences.cn: 你替我把剃须刀装进包里了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had razor - sharp creases in his trousers.
He plugged his razor in to recharge it.
sentences.cn: 他把剃刀插在插座上，给它充电。

sentences.en: He shaved himself with a disposable razor.
His face had been slashed with a razor - blade.
sentences.cn: 他的脸被剃须刀片划破了.

sentences.en: It takes the West to put a razor - edge on him.
sentences.cn: 需要西部来使他机敏起来.

sentences.en: The camp is surrounded by razor-wire fences and guarded by military police.
sentences.cn: 营地周围架着尖利的铁丝网，且有宪兵看守。

sentences.en: The fellow is as sharp as a razor. Be careful in your dealings with him.
sentences.cn: 这家伙厉害得很, 你和他打交道时要特别小心.

sentences.en: There had been a famine of razor blades for months past.
sentences.cn: 前几个月剃刀刀片严重缺货.

sentences.en: This electric razor is our latest promotion.
sentences.cn: 这种电剃刀是我们的最新产品.
